org.nd4j.parameterserver.distributed.transport

Interface Transport

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseTransport, LocalTransport, MulticastTransport, RoutedTransport
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public interface Transport
    Transport interface describes Client -> Shard, Shard -> Shard, Shard -> Client communication
    Author:
    raver119@gmail.com
